Video: The family of Smolenska, which has been celebrated throughout the country, has shown the current living conditions.

Society♪9 hours ago.

Sidorov's family, which has acquired a bad glory after public speech by the neighbors, has agreed to give our crew an exclusive interview. I recall that the scandalous story overflew all regional and federal internets. Neighbors accuse Olga and Denis Sidorov of spreading dirt in their dormitory rooms, which is why residents of all floors suffer. After the announcement, two couple ' s sons were in a social institution.
